metadata.title: CVE-2024-35984 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  i2c: smbus: fix NULL function pointer dereference  Baruch reported an OOPS when using the designware controller as target only. Target-only modes break the assumption of one transfer function always being available. Fix this by always checking the pointer in __i2c_transfer.  [wsa: dropped the simplification in core-smbus to avoid theoretical regressions]
